title: Lec 10: Problems arising due to modern agricultural practices #CH24SP #swayamprabha

tasks.task: Lecturer discussing problems with modern farming and chemical use in agriculture.
subtasks: Presenting the philosophy of sustainable agriculture rooted in traditional knowledge.
Highlighting the negative impact of excessive chemical fertilizers on soil health.
Discussing the dangers of pesticide use, including resistance development in pests and health risks to humans.
Analyzing the environmental consequences of monoculture farming practices.
Presenting data on increasing pesticide and fertilizer usage and their correlation with crop yields.
Examining the effects of intensive agriculture on groundwater pollution and human health.

tasks.task: Critiquing the sustainability of modern agricultural practices and advocating for alternatives.
subtasks: Highlighting risks associated with genetically modified crops and second green revolutions.
Discussing the cycle of debt among farmers due to rising input costs and decreased profitability.
Call to action for educating the public and government about the drawbacks of conventional farming methods.
